oracle.pg.hbase

Class OracleAdjacentElementsFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter.Filter
      • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter.FilterBase
        • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter.CompareFilter
          • oracle.pg.hbase.OracleAdjacentElementsFilter

  • public class OracleAdjacentElementsFilter
extends org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter.CompareFilter
    This class extends HBase CompareFilter to filter cells based on a specified qualifier and having a qualifier length greater than 0.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter.CompareFilter
